name: Image Slider Block
author: WPDeveloper

sections.description:
Image Slider is a great way to display multiple images on your WordPress website. It will make your website interactive and also help to reduce page scroll.

Use this Image Slider plugin for Block Editor & showcase your images in a beautiful slider to boost the impact of the overall design and user experience of your website.

Completely Customizable: You can customize the content, speed, colors, etc to make it suitable for your website design.

Super Light-weight: No extra resources used and it’s highly optimized for super fast loading & instant Live editing.

Dedicated Support: We’ve an extraordinary support team ready to help you. Ask your questions in the support forum, we’ll get back to you immediately.

🚀 BACKED BY A TRUSTED TEAM

This Block is brought to you by WPDeveloper, the team behind the most popular elements library Essential Addons for Elementor (used by almost 700,000 happy users from 180+ countries).

👨‍💻 DOCUMENTATION AND SUPPORT

  • For documentation and tutorials go to our documentation
  • To report issue and contribution visit Github.
  • If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum.
  • For more information about features, FAQs and documentation, check out our website at WPDeveloper.

sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Block/Gutenberg Editor
  2. Search For “Slider Block”.
  3. Install in 1-click

Old Way:

  1. Upload slider-block to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Follow the Documentation
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.
sections.changelog:
1.3.8 – 08/04/2024

  • Fixed: compatibility support with wordpress 6.5 version
  • Improved: controls

1.3.7 – 29/01/2024

  • Fixed: Slider arrow size & position issue
  • Improved: font loader & controls

1.3.6 – 22/03/2023

  • Improved: controls

1.3.5 – 02/03/2023

  • Added: Alt text option for image
  • Improved: font loader & controls

1.3.4 – 07/09/2022

  • Fixed: slider gap broken issue

1.3.3 – 23/08/2022

  • Fixed: style handler php warning

1.3.2 – 06/07/2022

  • Added: Converted style-handler to php for working perfectly with Reusable blocks and FSE
  • Added: Link for only image style
  • Fixed: Image captions not syncing for the new image

1.3.1 – 29/05/2022

  • Added: Slider title from caption
  • Added: Animation, responsive controls
  • Improved: Controls and structure

1.3.0 – 18/04/2022

  • Added: Animation for all blocks
  • Added: Responsive Block Show/Hide option
  • Added: Custom CSS for all blcoks
  • Improved: Image Height Control for ‘Image with Content’ layouts
  • Improved: Controls and structure

1.2.0 – 09/02/2022

  • Fixed: Block Base theme support
  • Improved: Font Library Updated
  • Improved: Controls and structure

1.1.0 – 05/10/2021

  • Added: Responsive and more interactive controls
  • Added: Margin, padding, background, border, shadow controls for wrapper
  • Added: Content Slider
  • Added: Custom height for slider
  • Added: Vertical Slider
  • Added: Advance and responsive typography option
  • Added: More styling options
  • Improved: Clean code and load resources in optimize way

1.0.0 – 23-08-2020

  • Initial release
sections.reviews:
Great Plugin!

By Themico on March 26, 2024

It does what it says and it is doing it perfectly! Thank you!

Best functionality, best support

By Gwythan (Kevin Ashbridge) on March 9, 2023

I chose Image Slider Block because it offered the needed features and animation styles. Works well!

Then I needed something added to the plugin. I reached out to Amin and the team, and voila! It was added in the next release.

Great plugin, high responsive support. Highly recommended.

Very good plugin but

By ruhu1615 on January 9, 2023

Very good plugin but need to solve this Alt tag issue "Image elements do not have [alt] attributes". Please fix the issue ASAP

It works like you would want it to do

By Bhikkhu Subhuti on December 28, 2022

Your plugin was suggested when I tried to find a slider while in the editor. While I had a problem with the slider "not sliding" I noticed it was because default has "pause on hover" as default. In the process of not knowing the settings and looking for alternative sliders, I noticed how clunky the other top sliders were. Your slider works just like wp-gallery. Just the way it should work. I'm glad I noticed the setting to fix this "pause on hover".. Great work!

Works, but need more functions

By lillichan88 on April 27, 2022

Hey, the plugin works well. But missing some more features. I can only show 4 images , but i need to add more than 4. Or/and that i can add a second or more rows with images. Such like a image grid. Kind reagrds Olivia

Great plugin! Very intuitive!

By Diana K. Cury (Dianakc) on April 15, 2022

I loved this! I tried dozens plugins before sticking with this one. Simple and intuitive. I need to display images caption so had to edit the code in order to display that, hope the next version come with the option.

I like this plugin

By Qilin (qilin2000) on March 25, 2022

I like this plugin, free, lightweight but awesome. I really appreciate @mahbubshovan's help, he is the best customer support I've ever seen on this website, polite, enthusiastic and responsive. No plugin is perfect, the point is not problems, the point is how you guys deal with problems. Thank you for your help, I look forward to a new version of this plugin.
